text: Oops I finished the food... It is like a big canteen beside the pool. Good place to stop by for a rest and eat. Food is good and the portions are right. Unfortunately, like most tourism areas, the price is slightly on the high side. Nevertheless it is still considered affordable. This place is also kids friendly. Experience is great. Come try it.
Fabulous food. The birds are a nuisance though. But young cleaner cleared the unreturned plates and cutlery left by uncultured visitors fast. Thanks for her  commendable effort.

Food was better than expected for a waterpark restaurant, I was expecting only junk food but was surprised to see soup and few more cooked meals. There are 6 variants to choose from, pretty limited but OK.

There are a lot of birds nearby, might get a bit annoying

Great place to have hearty meal after & during water activities.
We did like there Fish & Chips and especially there services üëçüëçüëç
Fairly limited food options, but enough to cover the basics. Food is ok for a Water Adventure Park.
